items.sentence: A homeless man and a three-year-old boy argued for an hour about whether or not Batman has superpowers, which he does not.
Tom didn't know how long the leftover chicken had been in the fridge, so he erred on the side of caution and threw it out.
Tom isn\'t your average guy. He doesn\'t like things most guys like and he doesn\'t like to do things most men enjoy doing.
Why do you insist on paying for your school expenses yourself, when your parents are willing to give you financial support?
The United States and Britain have different sign languages. Mexican Sign Language also differs from Spanish Sign Language.
